A Partial Bibliography of Literature on Quasicrystals

This bibliography contains papers from 1996 to the present. If you have papers which should be added to this list, please give the full information on the papers to the Webmaster, Cynthia Jenks . An alternative bibliography, containing titles from February 1992 to present is available at ftp://www.glvt-cnrs.fr/pub/gdr5/quasi-publis. Another bibliography is available at http://www.kristall.ethz.ch/QDB/database2.html. An annotated bibliography of publications on Fourier-space crystallography is available at http://ewald.cas.usf.edu/quasibiblio.txt.

Last updated 05-May-2008

2008

T. Fujiwara and Y. Ishii "T. Fujiwara and Y. Ishiis", Quasicrystals, Elsevier, Amsterdam, 2008

G. D. W. Smith, P. S. Grant, M. L. Galano and F. E. Audebert "Metal matrix composite material", Application: WO
WO Patent No. 2007-GB4004 2008050099, 2008.

M. Schreiber "Aperiodic crystals: from modulated phases to quasicrystals. By T. Janssen, G. Chapuis, and M. de Boissieu. IUCr Monographs on Crystallography, No. 20. Oxford: IUCr/Oxford University Press, 2007. Pp. 466. Price GBP 75.00. ISBN 978-0-19-856777-6" Acta Crystallogr., Sect. A: Found. Crystallogr., 2008, A64, 433-434.

J. Basu and S. Ranganathan "Glass-forming ability and stability of ternary Ni-early transition metal (Ti/Zr/Hf) alloys" Acta Mater., 2008, 56, 1899-1907.

Z. M. Zhang, C. J. Xu and X. F. Guo "Microstructures and properties of reciprocatingly extruded Mg-6.4Zn-1.1Y alloys" Acta Metall. Sin. (Engl. Lett.), 2008, 21, 37-42.

Z. M. Zhang, C. J. Xu and X. F. Guo "Microstructure of Mg-6.4Zn-1.1Y alloy fabricated by rapid solidification and reciprocating extrusion" Acta Metall. Sin. (Engl. Lett.), 2008, 21, 30-36.

V. Karpus, G. J. Babonas, A. Reza, A. Suchodolskis, S. Tumenas, O. Hunderi, W. Assmus and S. Bruhne "Optical response of fci-ZnMgHo quasicrystal" Acta Phys. Pol., A, 2008, 113, 1005-1008.

E. Di Gennaro, C. Miletto, S. Savo, A. Andreone, D. Morello, V. Galdi, G. Castaldi and V. Pierro "Evidence of local effects in anomalous refraction and focusing properties of dodecagonal photonic quasicrystals" arXiv.org, e-Print Arch., Phys., 2008, 1-4, arXiv:0804 1692v1 [physics optics].

J.-j. Zhang, Y.-x. Wang, Z. Chen and B. Liu "Free energy calculation of Al-Cu-Fe quasicrystal phase with the effect of external potential" Cailiao Rechuli Xuebao, 2008, 29, 146-151.

Y.-q. Fu, Z.-x. Ren, Z.-q. Liang, F. Zhou and Y. Gao "Influence of substrate thermal conductivity on the phase composition of high velocity oxy-fuel sprayed Al-Cu-Cr quasicrystalline coatings" Dalian Haishi Daxue Xuebao, 2008, 34, 112-115.

Q. Lin and J. D. Corbett "Interpenetrating Networks of Three-Dimensional Penrose Tiles in CaAu3Ga, the Structurally Simplest Cubic Approximant of an Icosahedral Quasicrystal" Inorg. Chem. (Washington, DC, U. S.), 2008, 47, 3462-3464.

S. Balanetskyy and B. Grushko "A study of the high-Al part of the Al-Pd-Re phase diagram" J. Alloys Compd., 2008, 456, 105-112.

S. Scudino, S. Venkataraman, M. Sakaliyska and J. Eckert "Crystallization behavior and consolidation of ball milled Zr60Ti5Ag5Cu12.5Ni10Al7.5 glassy powders" J. Alloys Compd., 2008, 456, 159-162.

S. Yin, Z. Xie, Q. Bian, B. He, Z. Pan, Z. Sun, Z. Wei, L. Qian and S. Wei "Formation of AlCuFe icosahedral quasicrystal by mechanical alloying: XAFS and XRD studies" J. Alloys Compd., 2008, 455, 314-321.

S. Kenzari, V. Demange, P. Boulet, M. C. de Weerd, J. Ledieu, J. M. Dubois and V. Fournee "Complex metallic alloys in the Ce-Au-Sn system: a study of the atomic and electronic structures" J. Phys.: Condens. Matter, 2008, 20, 095218/1-095218/7.

V. S. Kraposhin, A. L. Talis and H. T. Lam "The structure model of a cubic aperiodic phase ('quasicrystal without forbidden symmetry axes')" J. Phys.: Condens. Matter, 2008, 20, 114115/1-114115/6.

O. Rapp, A. A. Karkin, B. N. Goshchitskii, V. I. Voronin, V. Srinivas and S. J. Poon "Electronic and atomic disorder in icosahedral AlPdRe" J. Phys.: Condens. Matter, 2008, 20, 114120/1-114120/6.

A. I. Zaitsev, N. E. Zaitseva, R. Y. Shimko, N. A. Arutyunyan, S. F. Dunaev, V. S. Kraposhin and H. T. Lam "Thermodynamic properties of Al-Mn, Al-Cu, and Al-Fe-Cu melts and their relations to liquid and quasicrystal structure" J. Phys.: Condens. Matter, 2008, 20, 114121/1-114121/4.

J. Lendvai, D. Fatay and J. Gubicza "Indentation creep study on a Zr-based bulk metallic glass containing nano-quasicrystals" Mater. Sci. Eng., A, 2008, 483-484, 607-610.

A. Golovko, Y. Golovko, L. Gorbunova, V. Kamyanov, G. Pevneva and T. Filimonova "Principal regularities in compsitions and structures of high-molecular compounds from crude oils and natural bitumens" Oil Gas Sci. Technol, 2008, 63, 95-114.

A. N. Poddubny, L. Pilozzi, M. M. Voronov and E. L. Ivchenko "Resonant Fibonacci quantum well structures in one dimension" Phys. Rev. B: Condens. Matter Mater. Phys., 2008, 77, 113306/1-113306/4.

A. W. Rodriguez, A. P. McCauley, Y. Avniel and S. G. Johnson "Computation and visualization of photonic quasicrystal spectra via Bloch's theorem" Phys. Rev. B: Condens. Matter Mater. Phys., 2008, 77, 104201/1-104201/10.

T. Fujiwara and Y. Ishii "Introduction to quasicrystals" Quasicrystals, 2008, 1-9.

Y. Ishii and T. Fujiwara "Electronic structures and stability mechanism of quasicrystals" Quasicrystals, 2008, 171-208.

T. Ishimasa "New group of icosahedral quasicrystals" Quasicrystals, 2008, 49-74.

M. Krajci and J. Hafner "Ab-initio studies of quasicrystalline surfaces" Quasicrystals, 2008, 313-355.

D. Mayou and G. Trambly de Laissardiere "Quantum transport in quasicrystals and complex metallic alloys" Quasicrystals, 2008, 209-265.

S. Takeuchi and K. Edagawa "Elastic and plastic properties of quasicrystals" Quasicrystals, 2008, 267-311.

A.-P. Tsai and C. P. Gomez "Quasicrystals and approximants in Cd-M systems and related alloys" Quasicrystals, 2008, 75-106.

A. Yamamoto and H. Takakura "Recent development of quasicrystallography" Quasicrystals, 2008, 11-47.

Z. Wen, J. Ma and X. Fu "Critical behaviors of Ising model on a two-dimensional quasilattice" Solid State Commun., 2008, 146, 304-306.

H. Aramoto, N. Kamo, T. Noda, T. Kaito and E. Oue "Quasi-single-crystal formation in semiconductor film on substrate for optical display fabrication", Application: JP JP Patent No. 2006-227283 2008053396, 2008.

K. Biswas and K. Chattopadhyay "Formation of w-Al7Cu2Fe phase during laser processing of quasicrystal-forming Al-Cu-Fe alloy" Philos. Mag. Lett., 2008, 88, 219-230.

A. L. Chen, Y.-S. Wang, Y.-F. Guo and Z.-D. Wang "Band structures of Fibonacci phononic quasicrystals" Solid State Commun., 2008, 145, 103-108.

G. Coddens "Comment on "Model of rotational tunneling in quasicrystals of the Cd6 Yb parent compound"" J. Alloys Compd., 2008, 454, 523-524.

J. D. Corbett "Exploratory synthesis: The fascinating and diverse chemistry of polar intermetallic phases" Abstracts of Papers, 235th ACS National Meeting, New Orleans, LA, United States, April 6-10, 2008, 2008, INOR-375.

T. Dai, X. Kang, B. Zhang, J. Xu, K. Bao, C. Xiong and Z. Gan "Study and formation of 2D microstructures of sapphire by focused ion beam milling" Microelectron. Eng., 2008, 85, 640-645.

F. Decremps, L. Belliard, B. Perrin and M. Gauthier "Sound Velocity and Absorption Measurements under High Pressure Using Picosecond Ultrasonics in a Diamond Anvil Cell: Application to the Stability Study of AlPdMn" Phys. Rev. Lett., 2008, 100, 035502/1-035502/4.

J. Dolinsek, J. Slanovec, Z. Jaglicic, M. Heggen, S. Balanetskyy, M. Feuerbacher and K. Urban "Broken ergodicity, memory effect, and rejuvenation in Taylor-phase and decagonal Al3(Mn,Pd,Fe) complex intermetallics" Phys. Rev. B: Condens. Matter Mater. Phys., 2008, 77, 064430/1-064430/18.

T. Y. Fan and L. Fan "Plastic fracture of quasicrystals" Philos. Mag., 2008, 88, 523-535.

Z. Fang, T. Dai, B. Zhang and X. Zhu "Micro-cylinder mode in photonic quasicrystal observed by near-field optical microscopy" Proc. SPIE, 2008, 6831, 683102/1-683102/5.

N. Ferralis, K. Pussi and R. D. Diehl "Debye temperature of the 10-fold d-Al-Ni-Co quasicrystal surface" Surf. Sci., 2008, 602, 1223-1226.

X. Fu, X. Zhang and Z. Hou "Band structure and localization of electronic states in a fivefold symmetric quasicrystal model" J. Non-Cryst. Solids, 2008, 354, 1740-1743.

M. Galano, F. Audebert, I. C. Stone and B. Cantor "Effect of Nb on nanoquasicrystalline Al-based alloys" Philos. Mag. Lett., 2008, 88, 269-278.

Y. Gao, B.-X. Xu, B.-S. Zhao and T.-C. Chang "New general solutions of plane elasticity of one-dimensional quasicrystals" Phys. Status Solidi B, 2008, 245, 20-27.

Y. Gao, S.-P. Xu and B.-S. Zhao "A theory of general solutions of 3D problems in 1D hexagonal quasicrystals" Phys. Scr., 2008, 77, 015601/1-015601/6.

R. C. Gauthier "Perfect periodic photonic quasi-crystals" Proc. SPIE, 2008, 6901, 69011F/1-69011F/9.

J. Gubicza, J. L. Labar, E. Agocs, D. Fatay and J. Lendvai "Effect of nano-quasicrystals on viscosity of a Zr-based bulk metallic glass" Scr. Mater., 2008, 58, 291-294.

J. Gubicza, J. L. Labar, E. Agocs, D. Fatay and J. Lendvai "Corrigendum to "Effect of nano-quasicrystals on viscosity of a Zr-based bulk metallic glass" [Scripta Mater. 58 (2008) 291-294]" Scr. Mater., 2008, 58, 1038.

M. Guo, Z. Xu and X. Wang "Photofabrication of Two-Dimensional Quasi-Crystal Patterns on UV-Curable Molecular Azo Glass Films" Langmuir, 2008, 24, 2740-2745.

K.-i. Hayashida, T. Dotera, A. Takano and Y. Matsushita "Mesoscopic quasicrystal in a three-arm polymeric star" Abstracts of Papers, 235th ACS National Meeting, New Orleans, LA, United States, April 6-10, 2008, 2008, POLY-564.

J. G. Heo "Method for manufacturing quasicrystal carbon nanotube/microfiber coated with carbon material", KR Patent No. 2008002035, 2008.

H. Huang, P. Dong, C. Yin, P. Zhang, B. Bai and C. Dong "Characterization and hydrogen absorption at low temperature of suction-cast Ti45Zr38Ni17 quasicrystalline alloy" Int. J. Hydrogen Energy, 2008, 33, 722-727.

H.-g. Huang, C. Yin, J. Wu and P.-c. Zhang "Hydrogen storage of as-cast Ti-Zr-Ni quasicrystals" Zhongguo Youse Jinshu Xuebao, 2008, 18, 108-112.

J. Y. Hwang, H. W. Doty and M. J. Kaufman "Crystallographic studies on the iron-containing intermetallic phases in the 319-type aluminium casting alloys" Philos. Mag., 2008, 88, 607-619.

S. Jayalakshmi, E. Fleury, D. Y. Lee, H. J. Chang and D. H. Kim "Hydrogenation of Ti50Zr25Co25 amorphous ribbons and its effect on their structural and mechanical properties" Philos. Mag. Lett., 2008, 88, 303-315.

V. Karpus, A. Suchodolskis, J. Taulavicius, U. O. Karlsson, W. Assmus, S. Bruehne and E. Uhrig "Photoemission spectroscopy study of si-ZnMgHo quasicrystals" Opt. Mater. (Amsterdam, Neth.), 2008, 30, 690-692.

A. Kocjan, P. J. McGuiness, A. Recnik and S. Kobe "Direct production of the Ti-Zr-Ni-Cu icosahedral phase for hydrogen-storage applications by rapid quenching from the melt" Mater. Res. Soc. Symp. Proc., 2008, 1042E, No pp. given, 1042-S01-04.

M. Krajci and J. Hafner "Theory of quasicrystal surfaces: Probing the chemical reactivity by atomic and molecular adsorption" Surf. Sci., 2008, 602, 182-197.

J. B. Langworthy and A. W. Saenz "Coherent pair production by energetic gamma rays incident on quasicrystals" Nucl. Instrum. Methods Phys. Res., Sect. B, 2008, 266, 734-744.

J. Ledieu, L. Leung, L. H. Wearing, R. McGrath, T. A. Lograsso, D. Wu and V. Fournee "Self-assembly, structure, and electronic properties of a quasiperiodic lead monolayer" Phys. Rev. B: Condens. Matter Mater. Phys., 2008, 77, 073409/1-073409/4.

Y. Lei, S. Kenzari, V. Demange, V. Fournee and J. M. Dubois "A new orthorhombic approximant of the icosahedral Al-Cu-Fe quasicrystal" Philos. Mag. Lett., 2008, 88, 279-286.

L. H. Li and T. Y. Fan "Complex variable function method for the plane elasticity and the dislocation problem of quasicrystals with point group 10 mm" Phys. Lett. A, 2008, 372, 510-514.

L. Liao and X. Fu "Structural properties of octagonal quasicrystal based on covering theory" Solid State Commun., 2008, 146, 35-38.

A. Losev "Wave models of non-crystallographic structures" Philos. Mag., 2008, 88, 201-208.

Y. Matsushita and T. Dotera "Symmetry in polymers: tricontinuous cubic and tiling structures" Kobunshi, 2008, 57, 71-75.

M. Mihalkovic, C. L. Henley, M. Widom and P. Ganesh "Empirical oscillating potentials for alloys from ab-initio fits" arXiv.org, e-Print Arch., Condens. Matter, 2008, 1-5, arXiv:0802 2926v2 [cond-mat mtrl-sci].

B. P. Ngoc, C. Geantet, M. Aouine, G. Bergeret, S. Raffy and S. Marlin "Quasicrystal derived catalyst for steam reforming of methanol" Int. J. Hydrogen Energy, 2008, 33, 1000-1007.

R. Nicula, M. Stir, F. Turquier and E. Burkel "Single-phase bulk Al-Cu-Fe quasicrystals by field-assisted sintering" Mater. Sci. Eng., A, 2008, A475, 113-116.

J. B. Qiang, W. Zhang, G. Q. Xie and A. Inoue "Effect of Ti addition on the crystallization behavior and glass-forming ability of Zr-Al-Cu alloys" J. Non-Cryst. Solids, 2008, 354, 2054-2059.

R. Rosenbaum, S. Balanetskyy, B. Grushko and B. Przepiorzynski "Very Low Temperature Electronic Transport in Al-Pd-Re Quasicrystalline Alloys" J. Low Temp. Phys., 2008, 150, 82-100.

Appl. Phys., 2008, 103, 044907/1-044907/8.

P. J. Steinhardt "How does your quasicrystal grow?" Nature (London, U. K.), 2008, 452, 43-44.

W. Steurer and S. Deloudi "Fascinating quasicrystals" Acta Crystallogr., Sect. A: Found. Crystallogr., 2008, A64, 1-11.

A. Agrawal, T. Matsui, Z. V. Vardeny and A. Nahata "Terahertz transmission properties of quasiperiodic and aperiodic aperture arrays" Journal of the Optical Society of America B: Optical Physics, 2007, 24, 2545-2555.

Y. Akama and S. Iizuka "Cut-and-project sets and their [image omitted]-duals" Philosophical Magazine, 2007, 87, 2847-2854.

V. M. Azhazha, A. M. Bovda, S. D. Lavrinenko, L. V. Onishchenko, S. V. Malykhin, A. T. Pugachev, M. V. Reshetnyak, A. N. Stetsenko and B. A. A. Bahabad, N. Voloch, A. Arie and R. Lifshitz "Experimental confirmation of the general solution to the multiple phase matching problem" Los Alamos National Laboratory, Preprint Archive, Condensed Matter, 2007, 1-6, arXiv:cond-mat/0701358.

A. Bahabad, N. Voloch, A. Arie and R. Lifshitz "Experimental confirmation of the general solution to the multiple-phase-matching problem" Journal of the Optical Society of America B: Optical Physics, 2007, 24, 1916-1921.

J. Barzola-Quiquia and P. Haeussler "Electronic transport properties of amorphous and quasicrystals TMxAl100-x alloys" Journal of Non-Crystalline Solids, 2007, 353, 3237-3242.

E. Belin-Ferre and J.-M. Dubois "About the role of hybridization in wetting and friction on Al-based complex metallic compounds" Materials Science & Engineering, A: Structural Materials: Properties, Microstructure and Processing, 2007, A449-A451, 971-974.

A. Bilusic, A. Smontara, J. Dolinsek, P. McGuiness and H. R. Ott "Phonon scattering in quasicrystalline i-Al72Pd19.5Mn8.5: A study of the low-temperature thermal conductivity" Journal of Alloys and Compounds, 2007, 432, 1-6.

J. Bohannon "Quasi-Crystal Conundrum Opens a Tiling Can of Worms" Science (Washington, DC, United States), 2007, 315, 1066.

T. Boncina, B. Markoli, I. Anzel and F. Zupanic "Phases in a quasicrystalline alloy Al64,4Cu23,5Fe13,1" Mater. Tehnol., 2007, 41, 271-277.

A. Y. Braginsky "Inhomogeneous ordered states and translational nature of the gauge group in the Landau continuum theory: II. Applications of the general theory" Journal of Experimental and Theoretical Physics, 2007, 105, 35-41.

P. Brommer and F. Gaehler "Potfit: effective potentials from ab-initio data" Los Alamos National Laboratory, Preprint Archive, Condensed Matter, 2007, 1-11, arXiv:0704 0185v1 [cond-mat mtrl-sci].

P. Brommer and F. Gaehler "Effective potentials for quasicrystals from ab-initio data" Los Alamos National Laboratory, Preprint Archive, Condensed Matter, 2007, 1-7, arXiv:0704 0163v1 [cond-mat mtrl-sci].

P. Brommer and F. Gaehler "Potfit: effective potentials from ab initio data" Modelling and Simulation in Materials Science and Engineering, 2007, 15, 295-304.

B. Cantor "Stable and metastable multicomponent alloys" Annales de Chimie (Cachan, France), 2007, 32, 245-256.

M. Cekada, P. Panjan, J. Dolinsek, A. Zalar, Z. Medunic, M. Jaksic and N. Radic "Diffusion during annealing of Al/Cu/Fe thin films" Thin Solid Films, 2007, 515, 7135-7139.

C. T. Chan "Bandgap engineering. Quasicrystals enter third dimension" Nature Photonics, 2007, 1, 91-92.
